original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.12. Kusalattika, Parittārammaṇattika🔽Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusala attika paritta ārammaṇa attika  na kusalam na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: The wholesome, not having a limited object, is a condition, as a root-cause condition, for the indeterminate, having a limited object. (Abbreviated.) As root-cause, three … as an object, three … as an object and as a decisive-support, three … as an object, as support, and as a decisive-support, three … As a prenascence, three … as a postnascence, three … as a prenascence and as a postnascence, three … As a prenascence, as support, and as a postnascence, three … As a prenascence, as an object, and as a postnascence, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, and as a postnascence, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, and as a decisive-support, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, and as a postnascence, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, and as a kamma condition, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as a kamma condition, and as a nutriment condition, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as a kamma condition, as a nutriment condition, and as a association condition, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as a kamma condition, as a nutriment condition, as a association condition, and as a presence, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as a kamma condition, as a nutriment condition, as an association condition, as a presence, and as a non-disappearance, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as a kamma condition, as a nutriment condition, as an association condition, as a presence, as a non-disappearance, and as a root-cause, three … As a prenascence, as an object, as support, as a decisive-support, as
